Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BatteryDrainRate" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerBitpack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Duration" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="AppCpuCyclesBitpack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeStamp" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="JoulesPerHourScreenOnDC" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="JoulesPerHourScreenOffDC" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DCTimeBitpack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CPUCyclesOnDCBitpack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskMBRead" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskMBWritten" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerInMilliwatts" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CpuStatsBitpack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DiskAndNetStatsBitPack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DurationBitPack" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ModernAppPackageName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousBrightnessLevel" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="PreviousBrightnessDurationInSeconds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewBrightnessLevel" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousStateDurationInSeconds" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewEnergySaverState" inType="win:Int8" outType="xs:byte"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TimeStamp" inType="win:SYSTEMTIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="AppId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="EnergyLoss" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="CpuEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SocEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="DisplayEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="DiskEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NetworkEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="MbbEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="OtherEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="TotalEnergyConsumption" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name=" MeasuredPower" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="OnBattery" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Foreground" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ScreenOn" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BatterySaverActive" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LowPowerEpochActive" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>
